archimate:Assessment.name: Time to notify authorities of data breach
archimate:Assessment.documentation:
The time taken from the discovery of a data breach to the notification of the appropriate legal or regulatory body.
GDPR The controller shall notify the breach without undue delay and, where feasible, not later than 72 hours after having become aware of it
Jiri Paloch: Deemed unnecessary as a metric, but it would make sense to include it as a process step.
